select startCost
from InitMarketEarth ime
where ime.resources = :resources and ime.game = :game

select constValue
from InitMarketEarth ime
where ime.resources = :resources and ime.game = :game

select startValue
from InitMarketEarth ime
where ime.resources = :resources and ime.game = :game

select constConsum
from InitMarketEarth ime
where ime.resources = :resources and ime.game = :game

select multiPriceIncr
from InitMarketEarth ime
where ime.resources = :resources and ime.game = :game

select saleCost
from MarketEarth me
where me.resources = :resources and me.game = :game and me.gameDate = :gameDate

select buyCost
from MarketEarth me
where me.resources = :resources and me.game = :game and me.gameDate = :gameDate

select val
from MarketEarth me
where me.resources = :resources and me.game = :game and me.gameDate = :gameDate

select rs.count
from GameResStat grs join grs.gameStat gs join grs.resStat rs
where gs.game = :game and gs.gameDate = :gameDate and rs.resources.idEnum = ru.fedichkindenis.enums.InitResources.CREDITS

select count(ug.user)
from UsrGame ug
where ug.game = :game and ug.delDate is null

select count(p.id)
from Ppl p
where p.game = :game and p.stat = ru.fedichkindenis.enums.StatusPpl.IN_GAME
